formConfig.yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
---
apiVersion: custom/v1
kind: Custom

# copy k8s manifests
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata: 
  name: "{{edited_deployment.value?.metadata.name || ''}}"
spec:
  replicas: "{{edited_deployment.value?.spec.replicas || ''}}"
  selector:
    matchLabels: "{{edited_deployment.value?.spec.selector.matchLabels || {}}}"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels: "{{edited_deployment.value?.spec.template.metadata.labels || {}}}"
---
apiVersion: custom/v1
kind: Custom
container:
  name: "{{edited_deployment.value?.spec.template.spec.containers[0].name || ''}}"
  image: "{{edited_deployment.value?.spec.template.spec.containers[0].image || ''}}"
